description:
About Us：

NBCN is the #1 US LIVE agency with more than 4,000 creators and working with some of the top brands on TikTok like Coca-Cola, Cider, Brookstone, Zimba, Dreo, etc.. You can know more about us through our website: https://www.nbcn.live/. We are excited that you are ready to join and make more than $10,000 a month like our top performers!


Responsibilities:

Live Streaming Excellence:

  • Host captivating live sessions on TikTok, spotlighting fashion products, offering styling advice, and engaging with viewers in real-time.
  • Use your charisma and expertise to create an immersive and interactive experience that resonates with fashion enthusiasts.

Innovative Content Creation:

  • Develop and execute creative concepts for live streams, including content planning, scriptwriting, and organizing compelling product demonstrations.
  • Design visually engaging and on-brand livestream experiences that highlight the latest fashion trends and product features.

Dynamic Audience Engagement:

  • Interact with viewers during live broadcasts, responding to comments, addressing questions, and fostering a lively and supportive community atmosphere.
  • Build and maintain strong connections with your audience, encouraging participation and feedback.

Strategic Product Promotion:

  • Promote fashion items, accessories, and trends featured in your live sessions, leveraging your expertise to drive sales and boost brand visibility.
  • Highlight the unique selling points of products, aligning promotions with current fashion trends to captivate and convert viewers.

Cross-Functional Collaboration:

  • Partner with marketing and e-commerce teams to ensure your livestream efforts align with broader marketing strategies and product launch plans.
  • Contribute to collaborative projects and initiatives that enhance the overall effectiveness of brand campaigns.

Trend Awareness and Adaptability:

  • Stay up-to-date with the latest fashion trends, industry news, and influencer collaborations to keep your content fresh and relevant.
  • Adapt your content strategy to reflect evolving trends, audience preferences, and emerging fashion movements.

Qualifications:

Passion for Fashion:

  • Deep knowledge and enthusiasm for fashion trends, styles, and brands, with a keen eye for what’s current and on-trend.

Social Media Expertise:

  • Proficient in using TikTok and other social media platforms, with a solid grasp of live streaming best practices and audience engagement strategies.

Outstanding Communication Skills:

  • Exceptional verbal communication abilities, with the talent to connect with a diverse audience and present fashion content in an engaging and accessible manner.

Creative Content Developer:

  • Proven ability to generate innovative and compelling content ideas that resonate with fashion enthusiasts and enhance viewer experience.

Adaptability and Agility:

  • Comfortable navigating a fast-paced environment, with the flexibility to adapt to changing trends and evolving viewer preferences.

Collaborative Team Player:

  • Experience working collaboratively with marketing, content creators, and e-commerce specialists to achieve shared goals and drive success.


    • Salary

    • hourly fixed fee ($30-$45/hour）+ performance based bonus
    • Full time/ part time/ internships are both available


    Benefits：

    • Learning and working with the top teams in the Live business
    • Flexible schedule
    • Competitive salary
    • Employee snacks and drinks
    • Pet friendly environment
